creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: predominately white wool with geometric designs located at top and bottom of blanket; geometric designs are black, white, red, and yellow in color; blanket made of six long strips stiched together; long edges of blanket have black edge; red, yellow, black, and white design along center panel stich; white tassels are located along the blankets shorter edges; each corner of blanket has a black tassel
title: Blanket
